r.d: This extension allows you to use the versatile JSONPath query language to extract the properties that you want from a decoded JSON document.
r.n:
## Changes - missing file and license uri @remicollet (#137)
## Bug fixes - Add missing config.w32 entry to package.xml to make PECL builds on Windows possible @crocodele (#138) - Add required email tag to lead details @crocodele (#140)
## Maintenance - Add Mike to list of PECL extension developers, release version 0.9.4 @crocodele (#139)
